content: @oprahsnooch Right!? All I want is Chinese food and all I get is the impossible whopper. Not that I’m complaining but I can’t wait to have sweet-and-sour “chicken“ again
@hoffsbeefs Er, Impossible Foods Whopper. Can't keep those companies straight
@runwayEscape The impossible whopper is so good! I never thought I could have fast food again. Bless you Burger King
@melsanie I think that’s impossible, BUT, always bring a food you want to eat, and a friend you want to catch up with?
@GPHash_ I swear I’m just living week to week trying to make a schedule where everything is clean, food is cooked and sleep is good and it’s an impossible thing to achieve lmao
